Subjects randomize 1:1 ratio Amulet LAA occlusion device ( treatment ) Boston Scientific WATCHMAN® LAA closure device ( Control ) . The trial conduct 150 site worldwide . All enrolled subject follow protocol-required test assessment schedule follow-up visit .
